sqlMap.select: SELECT USER_ID,USER_NAME,GRP_ISS_CD FROM ( SELECT A.USER_ID,USER_NAME,ROWNUM GRP_ISS_CD FROM GIIS_USERS A,GIIS_USER_GRP_HDR B WHERE A.USER_GRP = B.USER_GRP AND B.USER_GRP_DESC LIKE '%ISSUA%' ORDER BY A.USER_ID )
SELECT USER_NAME FROM GIIS_USERS WHERE USER_ID = #value#
SELECT assd_no FROM gipi_polbasic WHERE POLICY_ID = #value#
SELECT sys_context('USERENV','DB_NAME') AS Instance FROM dual

SELECT distinct a.tran_cd,a.line_cd,a.iss_cd FROM giis_user_grp_line a, giis_users b,giis_user_grp_dtl c WHERE a.user_grp = b.user_grp AND a.user_grp = c.user_grp AND a.tran_cd = c.tran_cd AND b.user_id = #value# UNION SELECT distinct a.tran_cd,a.line_cd,a.iss_cd FROM giis_user_line a,giis_user_iss_cd b WHERE a.USERID = #value# AND b.USERID = a.USERID AND b.ISS_CD = a.ISS_CD AND b.TRAN_CD = a.TRAN_CD ORDER BY 1

SELECT distinct a.tran_cd FROM giis_user_grp_line a, giis_users b,giis_user_grp_dtl c WHERE a.user_grp = b.user_grp AND a.user_grp = c.user_grp AND a.tran_cd = c.tran_cd AND b.user_id = #value# UNION SELECT distinct a.tran_cd FROM giis_user_line a,giis_user_iss_cd b WHERE a.USERID = #value# AND b.USERID = a.USERID AND b.ISS_CD = a.ISS_CD AND b.TRAN_CD = a.TRAN_CD ORDER BY 1

SELECT distinct a.line_cd line_cd FROM giis_user_grp_line a, giis_users b,giis_user_grp_dtl c WHERE a.user_grp = b.user_grp AND a.user_grp = c.user_grp AND a.tran_cd = c.tran_cd AND b.user_id = #userId# AND a.tran_cd = #tranCd# UNION SELECT distinct a.line_cd line_cd FROM giis_user_line a,giis_user_iss_cd b WHERE a.USERID = #userId# AND b.USERID = a.USERID AND b.ISS_CD = a.ISS_CD AND b.TRAN_CD = a.TRAN_CD AND a.tran_cd = #tranCd# ORDER BY 1

SELECT distinct a.iss_cd iss_cd FROM giis_user_grp_line a, giis_users b,giis_user_grp_dtl c WHERE a.user_grp = b.user_grp AND a.user_grp = c.user_grp AND a.tran_cd = c.tran_cd AND b.user_id = #userId# AND a.tran_cd = #tranCd# UNION SELECT distinct a.iss_cd iss_cd FROM giis_user_line a,giis_user_iss_cd b WHERE a.USERID = #userId# AND b.USERID = a.USERID AND b.ISS_CD = a.ISS_CD AND b.TRAN_CD = a.TRAN_CD AND a.tran_cd = #tranCd# ORDER BY 1

SELECT module_id FROM GIIS_USER_MODULES WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND ACCESS_TAG = '1' UNION SELECT module_id FROM GIIS_USER_GRP_MODULES WHERE USER_GRP IN(SELECT USER_GRP FROM GIIS_USERS WHERE USER_ID = #userId#) AND ACCESS_TAG = '1'
